application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 16 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) of planning permission 20/03077/FUL(Construction of a new 2-storey sports hall comprising hall, office, storage, foyer and viewing gallery with associated tree screening)
decision_conditions: The details submitted in relation to Condition 16 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) of planning permission 20/03077/FUL are considered unacceptable and inconsistent. Therefore, falling outisde the interests of sustainability and energy conservation and policy SI2 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1, DM3 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012
